None.Name: Group Hug
None.Description: Activate to heal Mo. The overall heal amount depends on how many friendly units are surrounding Mo. The higher the amount of maximum life points of nearby friendly units is the more powerful will this spell become. A maximum of 3000 life points may be healed while there is a minimum heal of at least 500. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Mo's better blues
None.Description: Activate to increase the damage of nearby friendly units by 30% for 15 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Stampede
None.Description: Activate to rush towards the target dealing 170 damage to enemies along the way, up to 7750 in total. Reusable every 30 seconds.

en.Description:
Stampede: +10 damage per target, 350 in total
Mo's better blues: +10% Damage Bonus

Stampede: +20 damage per target, 900 in total
Mo's better blues: +5s Duration

Stampede: +20 damage per target, 900 in total
Mo's better blues: +10% Damage Bonus

Extra.en: Stampede deals up to full damage to structures,  making it a really strong Siege move. Stampede halts upon going straight through orbs or wells,  still capable of breaking them down.
